skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Loyal, fierce, powerful and surprisingly fast – a War Bear is a symbol of Kislev itself.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.
Long has peace in the Old World been bought with the blood of Kislev. When Ruination descends, none are more ready to meet it than the hardy guardians of the north.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summoned unit has increased melee attack and melee defence
Summoned unit has greatly increased melee attack and melee defence

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: There are any number of mysterious wonders secreted away in the shadows, for those discerning enough to find them.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: "Kislev's coffers will be overflowing! The things we could do with all that gold!"

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings

Construction cost: -6% for all buildings

skillTree.localised_description: There is much to be learned from one's neighbours, especially if they fail to shroud their discoveries from prying eyes.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 4
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 8
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 12

skillTree.localised_description: "Show no mercy for the enemies of Kislev, for they will show no mercy to you!"
Often the most dangerous assault comes from the enemy you least expect.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 10% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Those who seek greater understanding will find when time comes.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +3
	(own armies in province)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +6
	(own armies in province)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.
Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

skillTree.localised_description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

skillTree.localised_description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
